sessions.notes: Practiced Tiger style form, focused on balance and flow. Worked on the opening sequence and refined my stance transitions.
Great sparring session with advanced practitioners. Practiced defensive techniques and counter-attacks. Need to work on timing.
Deep breathing exercises and mindfulness practice. Focused on inner peace and mental clarity. Very relaxing session.
Staff training session - learned new spinning techniques and combinations. Master showed advanced forms with double staff.
Intensive forms practice session. Worked on Crane style and Dragon style forms. Very challenging but rewarding.
Pushing hands practice with senior students. Improved sensitivity and learned to redirect opponent's energy more effectively.
Physical conditioning and strength training. Worked on core stability, leg strength, and flexibility. Tough but necessary.
Practical self-defense applications. Learned how to apply Kung Fu techniques in real-world scenarios. Very practical session.
